text: I’m so excited to talk about the brand-new Studio McGee Christmas Collection from Target’s Threshold line! Every year, I look forward to those little touches that bring warmth and magic into our homes during the holiday season, and this collection has done just that. It’s cozy, classic, and just the right amount of festive—perfect for creating that lived-in, loved feel we all crave this time of year.Let’s dive into some of my absolute must-haves from the collection:1. Stoneware Serving PlattersWe all know that hosting around the holidays means bringing out those go-to serving pieces that are as functional as they are beautiful. The Stoneware Round Serving Platter and Oval Serving Platter are perfect for holiday dinners. Their neutral tones pair beautifully with any table setting, whether you’re serving Christmas dinner or cookies for Santa! 2. Christmas Art PrintsIf you’re looking for something to add instant charm to your walls, the Merry Christmas Santa and Reindeer Framed Wall Art is a vintage-inspired piece that gives me all the nostalgic vibes. For something a little more festive and traditional, the 12 Days of Christmas Framed Wall Art adds that perfect touch of storybook holiday magic. 3. Cozy Christmas Throws and PillowsYou all know how much I love a good throw blanket—and the Knit Scalloped Edge Throw from Studio McGee is giving me all the cozy cottage vibes! It’s perfect for layering on a sofa or draped over the end of a bed for that added warmth (both literally and decoratively). Pair it with the Holiday Tree Square Throw Pillow for a cozy corner, or the Holly Striped Lumbar Pillow for a festive touch on a bench or chair. 4. The Perfect Tree Skirt & StockingsNothing pulls together a Christmas tree like a tree skirt, and I am in love with the Scalloped Knit Tree Skirt. It’s neutral but rich in texture, and it’ll complement any tree decor. And don’t forget to hang your stockings—how adorable is this Knit Stocking with Scallop Trim? It’s simple, cozy, and classic. If you’re more into a pop of color, the Poinsettia Woven Stocking is equally stunning. 5. Ornaments & Holiday AccentsStudio McGee has truly elevated the ornament game this year! The Set of 11 Velvet Decorative Ornaments and Hammered Gold Metal Bird Ornaments are the perfect additions to any tree—whether you’re going for a more rustic feel or classic elegance. For a finishing touch, check out the Decorative Hanging Bells, perfect for adding that extra layer of festive joy to your home. 6. Holiday-Ready WreathsNo home is complete for the holidays without a beautiful wreath to greet guests at the door. The Magnolia and Pine Holiday Artificial Wreath is such a beautiful way to welcome the season. It’s elegant and understated with just the right touch of greenery to freshen up any space. This entire collection feels like the perfect mix of old and new—timeless pieces that’ll become holiday staples for years to come. From the soft textures to the traditional patterns, it’s everything I look for when creating a cozy, inviting Christmas home.Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!
html:
I’m so excited to talk about the brand-new Studio McGee Christmas Collection from Target’s Threshold line! Every year, I look forward to those little touches that bring warmth and magic into our homes during the holiday season, and this collection has done just that. It’s cozy, classic, and just the right amount of festive—perfect for creating that lived-in, loved feel we all crave this time of year.

Let’s dive into some of my absolute must-haves from the collection:

1. Stoneware Serving Platters

We all know that hosting around the holidays means bringing out those go-to serving pieces that are as functional as they are beautiful. The Stoneware Round Serving Platter and Oval Serving Platter are perfect for holiday dinners. Their neutral tones pair beautifully with any table setting, whether you’re serving Christmas dinner or cookies for Santa!

2. Christmas Art Prints

If you’re looking for something to add instant charm to your walls, the Merry Christmas Santa and Reindeer Framed Wall Art is a vintage-inspired piece that gives me all the nostalgic vibes. For something a little more festive and traditional, the 12 Days of Christmas Framed Wall Art adds that perfect touch of storybook holiday magic.

3. Cozy Christmas Throws and Pillows

You all know how much I love a good throw blanket—and the Knit Scalloped Edge Throw from Studio McGee is giving me all the cozy cottage vibes! It’s perfect for layering on a sofa or draped over the end of a bed for that added warmth (both literally and decoratively). Pair it with the Holiday Tree Square Throw Pillow for a cozy corner, or the Holly Striped Lumbar Pillow for a festive touch on a bench or chair.

4. The Perfect Tree Skirt & Stockings

Nothing pulls together a Christmas tree like a tree skirt, and I am in love with the Scalloped Knit Tree Skirt. It’s neutral but rich in texture, and it’ll complement any tree decor. And don’t forget to hang your stockings—how adorable is this Knit Stocking with Scallop Trim? It’s simple, cozy, and classic. If you’re more into a pop of color, the Poinsettia Woven Stocking is equally stunning.

5. Ornaments & Holiday Accents

Studio McGee has truly elevated the ornament game this year! The Set of 11 Velvet Decorative Ornaments and Hammered Gold Metal Bird Ornaments are the perfect additions to any tree—whether you’re going for a more rustic feel or classic elegance. For a finishing touch, check out the Decorative Hanging Bells, perfect for adding that extra layer of festive joy to your home.

6. Holiday-Ready Wreaths

No home is complete for the holidays without a beautiful wreath to greet guests at the door. The Magnolia and Pine Holiday Artificial Wreath is such a beautiful way to welcome the season. It’s elegant and understated with just the right touch of greenery to freshen up any space.

This entire collection feels like the perfect mix of old and new—timeless pieces that’ll become holiday staples for years to come. From the soft textures to the traditional patterns, it’s everything I look for when creating a cozy, inviting Christmas home.

Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!
